$the ball was ruled foul by 1B umpire Mark Ripperger; when the Mariners argued the ruling, the umpires huddled and overturned the call; Indians manager Terry Francona protested the game, which did not matter when the team won

ej,zunim001,P,littw901,Checked swing ej,mccll001,M,littw901,Checked swing $Mariners catcher Mike Zunino and manager Lloyd McClendon ejected by 1B umpire Will Little; McClendon argued with three different umpires and kicked his cap all over the field after Little denied the checked swing appeal
